Solicitor Gerald Kean has said he is shocked after the Solicitors Disciplinary Tribunal made a finding of misconduct against him .
The tribunal recommended that Mr Kean be fined €20,000 after it found there was misconduct on his part in respect of three allegations made by a former client .

In three days of hearings between November 2013 and February this year , the tribunal heard that the case stemmed from litigation brought against Mr O'Neill by Ballycotton Marine Services Ltd in 2005 .
